info.brief_description: What if a new kind of virus spread on earth and change people, people like you...
info.description:
You or a close relative are infected by a virus (or a parasite) who changes you, the changes can be physics, mental or hormonal. It's the story of the changes made by the virus/parasite and the life after that. Of course the virus/parasite is contagious and multiple peoples can be affect, but somes can be immune or it can just affect a type of persons (any types, gender, social class, ethnic group, religious group, type of personality, ...). The spreading is all yours, by air, by contact, by sex, ...

Be creative, make the continuation better than the last.

It's a fantasy science story, there is no magic, but you can be large with the logic and the scientifics laws. That can be on sexual themes or not. You can do TG, TF, bimbofication, mind bending, ...

You can talk at the third person or the first, but if a story begin in the third continue in that way, same thing with the first person.

You can follow multiple character or change the main character. Except for stories at the first person, these one please keep the first person for the main character for more clarity.

You can close a story, but please do it well, don't stop in a middle of something with a cheap solution.

You can kill characters too, but there too do it well, don't kill someone with few words and don't make him disapear of the story like he has never existed. The dead of the main character don't mean inevitably the end of the story, another character can continue the story. And resurection is possible.

I think I have say all I want you to know. :)
